title: Chemical Laboratory Vacuum Ventilation Hood (Contents NOT Included)
item_description:
Chemical Laboratory Vacuum Ventilation Hood (Contents NOT Included)

  • Width: 39.5”
  • Length: 71”
  • Height: 101”

Buyer is responsible for all disconnection, disassembly, and removal of this lot. No tools or assistance of any kind will be provided by West Auctions.

Removal Note: This lot is only available for removal July 14-18, 2025, from 9:00AM to 3:30PM each day. Removal appointments are required for pickup.
